definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)

sentences.english: Problems of postharvest treatment which were still existed were discussed too.
sentences.chinese: 同時對果品採後處理存在的問題進行了說明。

sentences.english: Opening model on precision heavy duty installation. Essy to save and repair.
sentences.chinese: 油壓裝置採開放式，易保養及維修。

sentences.english: The internal force of the shaft lining section and its corresponding external load are determined by electrical measures.
sentences.chinese: 採用電測法測量井壁載面的內力與其相應的外截。

sentences.english: Seize the day. Gather ye rosebuds while ye may. Why does the writer use these lines?
sentences.chinese: “及時採拮你的花蕾”，爲什麼作者要寫這幾句話？
採葡萄的工人已經走了。

sentences.english: He had struckoil in Persia, but not in the quantities he had hoped.
sentences.chinese: 他已經在波斯採到石油，但質量並非如其所原。

sentences.english: Early in the morning, the lawyer and his Czechoslovakian friend went out to pick berries for their morning breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，律師和他的朋友去外面採早飯喫的漿果。

sentences.english: The agency we are offering will be on a commission basis.
sentences.chinese: 我們所提出的代理業務採佣金制。

sentences.english: For two years I have been able to pick these beautiful flowers to decorate my master's table.
sentences.chinese: 這兩年來，我可以採這些花來裝飾主人的桌子。

sentences.english: SSR was determined by means of electric stimulation.
sentences.chinese: SSR檢測採用電刺激法進行。

sentences.english: Stope ground pressure control is a key issue in an open stope mining process.
sentences.chinese: 採場地壓控制是空場採礦法開採工藝的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: Tomorrow morning, I will go to pick some herbs for my father, you can go with me .
sentences.chinese: 明天我要去草原給阿爸採草藥，你可以跟我一起去。

sentences.english: Pick flowers for your partner from the side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 在路邊採一支花送給你的戀人。

sentences.english: Cut-off of honey taken before there will not be such a phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 以前採割過的蜂蜜都不會有這樣的現象。

sentences.english: Children like mulberry fields, where they can eat mulberries picked from the trees and catch grasshoppers.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們是喜歡桑園的，鑽進去採桑椹喫，一面捉蚱蜢。

sentences.english: Operations were performed via transsphenoidal approach to remove the tumors.
sentences.chinese: 手術採取經蝶入路行腫瘤切除術。

definition: color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
to open (a door)/to open up (for development)/to dispel/to refute/to repudiate
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
Hsinying city in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
same as 引導|引导[yin3 dao3]/Dao Yin, Daoist exercises involving breathing, stretching and self-massage
